message: Let's be fair, I propose we split it 55/45.  This way we both get a decent amount.
Your turn Alice.  I'm feeling generous, so I'm offering you the same deal you offered me.
I'm willing to increase my share slightly to 60%, but I'm not willing to go lower than that.  It's your turn next, so let's see if we can come to an agreement.
Okay Alice, let's stop wasting time. I'll accept your original offer of 55/45... but for me, of course.
